DataElement.preferredName: Attenuated Live Virus Vaccine Immunization Integer::30 Day Prior First Therapy Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded indicator response that signifies whether a patient has been vaccinated with a live vaccine within 30 days of receiving the first dose of clinical trial treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Attenuated Live Virus Vaccine Immunization Integer::30 Day Prior First Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Live vaccines prepared from microorganisms which have undergone physical adaptation (e.g., by radiation or temperature conditioning) or serial passage in laboratory animal hosts or infected tissue/cell cultures, in order to produce avirulent mutant strains capable of inducing protective immunity. Live-attenuated vaccines are used when a CD8+ T Cell (cellular cytotoxicity) response is desired._A technique used to cause an immune response that results in resistance to a specific disease, especially an infectious disease._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::30_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Earlier in time or order._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Live vaccines prepared from microorganisms which have undergone physical adaptation (e.g., by radiation or temperature conditioning) or serial passage in laboratory animal hosts or infected tissue/cell cultures, in order to produce avirulent mutant strain:A technique used to cause an immune response that results in resistance to a specific disease, especially an infectious disease.

Concepts.definition: Live vaccines prepared from microorganisms which have undergone physical adaptation (e.g., by radiation or temperature conditioning) or serial passage in laboratory animal hosts or infected tissue/cell cultures, in order to produce avirulent mutant strains capable of inducing protective immunity. Live-attenuated vaccines are used when a CD8+ T Cell (cellular cytotoxicity) response is desired.
Inoculating an individual with either killed or live agents to prevent contraction of a disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::30:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:Earlier in time or order.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received a live v
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a live vaccine within 30 days prior to the first dose of trial treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received live vaccine <=30 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received live vaccine within 28 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a live vaccine within 4 weeks prior to start of protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received live vaccination within four weeks prior to the first dose of nivolumab or while on trial?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received live vaccination within for weeks prior to the first dose of nivolumab or while on trial?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received live attenuated vaccine within 30 days prior to the first dose of IP or live vaccination, including virus vaccination and yellow fever vaccination within 6 months before start of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has received a live attenuated vaccine within 30 days prior starting or after completing MEDI4736 (durvalumab) treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a live vaccine within 30 days prior to the first dose of trial treatment and or will receive a live vaccine while participating in the trial?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received live vaccination within 30 days prior to the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has received a live attenuated vaccine within 30 days of dosing with M3814?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a live vaccine within 30 days of planned start of study therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a live vaccine within 30 days prior to the first dose of trial treatment and while participating on study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received live, attenuated influenza vaccine within 4 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1 or at any time during the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has received a live attenuated vaccine within 30 days of dosing with M3814 (peposertib)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a live vaccine within 30 days of planned treatment start?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received live vaccine within 28 days prior to initiation of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a live attenuated vaccine within 30 days of planned start of study therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received live vaccination within 30 days prior to starting M3814 and avelumab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received live attenuated vaccine within 30 days prior to the first dose of durvalumab?
